The Quranic researcher has a nation that has been given to her what she has earned and for you what you have earned and do not ask what they were doing a frequency of his counterpart, which is presented in the way The souls of the Samaids are bound by what it includes to be a meaning that was not preceded by his hearing for the addressees, so he was not killed in it with one of the same and the same and the same The words of the Arabs, Labid said: ؎ ؎ ؎ ؎ ؎ ؎ ؎ ؎ ؎ ؎ ؎ ؎ ؎ ؎ ؎ ؎ ؎ ؎ ؎ ؎ ؎ ؎ ؎ ؎ ؎ ؎ ؎ ؎ For when the dust, which was seized with the dusty fire, likened to the fire, it was renovated by the fire that it was overwhelmed by the wind of the north, and it increased its smoke and the sacrifice.For a lot of smoke, he repeated the similarity secondly because it is a deceptive strange.
